title: #177: Psychopathic Traits: The Teacher's Pet
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti discuss the impending trial and whether Chris Dawson is a psychopath.

#HerNameWasLynDawson

#CoerciveControl

#TheTeachersPet


If you have any information about Lyn's disappearance and/or the historical sexual abuse allegations, please contact Crimestoppers on 1800 333 000



For more information about coercive control

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/deep-diving-coercive-control/


Advice if you are being abused

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/advice-if-you-are-experiencing-abuse/


Advice if you believe someone else is being abused

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/advice-if-you-believe-someone-else-is-being-abused/


Psychopathy Checklist Revised (PCL-R)

https://www.mhs.com/MHS-Publicsafety?prodname=pcl-r2


https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/the-social-thinker/201801/3-key-traits-may-be-red-flags-psychopathy


http://www.businessinsider.com/hare-psychopath-checklist-test-sociopath-2016-11
